item.title: Download Passmark DiskCheckup 3.6 Build 1001
item.description: PassMark DiskCheckup allows users to monitor the SMART properties of a particular hard drive. SMART (Self-Monitoring Analysis and Reporting Technology) is a feature on a computer's hard disk that provides various monitoring metrics for disk reliability. If SMART is enabled on the hard disk, the system administrator can get analysis information from the hard drive to identify possible future hard drive failure.
